PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-10722021-12-29,  ,  ESDC,  , 
ActCanada Worker Lockdown Benefit Act
SubjectOrder Amending the Lockdown Regions Designation Order (COVID-19)
PrecisOrder amending the LOCKDOWN REGIONS DESIGNATION ORDER (COVID-19) to designate Newfoundland and Labrador; Nova Scotia; Prince Edward Island; New Brunswick; Quebec; Ontario; Manitoba; Alberta; British Columbia; and, Nunavut as “lockdown regions” in accordance with the Regulations amending the CANADA WORKER LOCKDOWN BENEFIT ACT (LOCKDOWN ORDER DEFINITION AND MINIMUM LOCKDOWN PERIOD), until such time as these lockdown orders cease to have effect.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0277 Publication Date: 2022-01-19
AttachmentsAttachment
